name: calf
content:
calf noun [C]
(ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 a young cow, or the young of various other large mammals such as elephants and whales See also
calve
Claudius Thiriet/Biosphoto/GettyImages in calf
If a cow is in calf, it is pregnant: Two of the herd were in calf.

calf noun [C]
(LEG)
C2 the thick curved part at the back of the human leg between the knee and the foot: She's been unable to play since January because of a torn calf muscle.
